cause.description:
Anyone who doesn't believe that poor, innocent animals should be harmed in order for people to use cosmetics should join this group. We are all about helping the animals in testing facilities, and stopping unfair treatment to the animals.
1. Animals shouldn't be harmed for the benefit of people.
2. People shouldn't be so selfish as to sacrifice innocent creatures for their own sakes.
cause.mission: end the treatment of cosmetics tested on animals.
cause.name: Stop Animal Testing
